meanings: [명사] vow, pledge, (특히 법정에서의) oath, [동사] swear, vow, pledge
the Pledge of Allegiance (to the flag)

vlive.korean: 진짜로? 맹세해? Really? Do you swear? 듣기 View video Mnet : 프로듀스101 시즌2 8화
오브콜스! - 맹세합니다! - 오브콜스! Of course! - I promise! - Of course! 듣기 View video MOMOLAND : [Replay] 모모랜드 5집 미니앨범 'Show Me' 컴백 쇼케이스 (MOMOLAND's 5th Mini Album 'Show Me' Comeback Showcase)
vlive.english: Of course! - I promise! - Of course!

vlive.korean: 맹세하세요 - 환영해요 - 감사합니다 - 약속! Please swear. - Welcome! - Thank you. - Promise us! 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] ITZY X LieV - ITZY의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: Please swear. - Welcome! - Thank you. - Promise us!

vlive.korean: 성심성의껏 진실만을 대답해줄 것을 맹세합니까? Do you promise to sincerely answer with honesty? 듣기 View video MOMOLAND : [Replay] 모모랜드 5집 미니앨범 'Show Me' 컴백 쇼케이스 (MOMOLAND's 5th Mini Album 'Show Me' Comeback Showcase)
vlive.english: Do you promise to sincerely answer with honesty?

vlive.korean: 그리고 맹세하는데... And I promise, I swear... 듣기 View video PRISTIN : [PRISTIN] 해피 레랑데이🍰

examples.korean: He vowed (that) he had not hurt her. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그녀를 다치게 하지 않았다고 맹세했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He vowed (that) he had not hurt her. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They swore their loyalty to the king. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 왕에 대한 충성을 맹세했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They swore their loyalty to the king. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She vowed never to speak to him again. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 결코 다시는 그에게 말을 하지 않겠다고 맹세했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She vowed never to speak to him again. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We all had to pledge allegiance to the flag. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 모두 국기에 대한 (충성) 맹세를 해야 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We all had to pledge allegiance to the flag. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He swore vengeance on his child’s killer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 자기 아이의 살해범에 대한 복수를 맹세했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He swore vengeance on his child’s killer. Add to Wordbook
